title: HoP 370 - Ingrid Rowland on Rome in the Renaissance
itunes:title: HoP 370 - Ingrid Rowland on Rome in the Renaissance
description: For our finale of the Italian Renaissance series we're joined by Ingrid Rowland, to speak about art, philosophy, and persecution in Renaissance Rome.
content:encoded: For our finale of the Italian Renaissance series we're joined by Ingrid Rowland, to speak about art, philosophy, and persecution in Renaissance Rome.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson
